Eclipse build: I20060504-2000

w/ Callisto RC1a

TPTP Trace Project 
Version: 4.1.100.v200604131758
Build id: TPTP-4.2.0-200604131758
==============================================

I have installed all of Callisto into a RC2 candidate build. I have also installed the YourKit profiler into this build. While trying to launch a profiling session I get an error dialog saying "An error occurred while attempting to resolve the data collectors selected." Since I can't click on the details to get further info, I go to the Error log where I find the following stack trace:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: An error occurred while attempting to resolve the data collectors selected
    at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.core.LauncherUtility.createCoreException(LauncherUtility.java:112)
    at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.internal.launcher.core.LauncherUtility.createCoreException(LauncherUtility.java:120)
    at org.eclipse.tptp.trace.ui.provisional.launcher.PrimaryLaunchDelegate.run(PrimaryLaunchDelegate.java:152)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:534)

Created an attachment (id=40493)
Error dialog for attempted profiler launch
